text: Dan Ashbaugh is an American para-alpine skier. He represented the United States at the 1988 Winter Paralympics in alpine skiing. He competed in three events and he won the gold medal in each event: in the Men's Downhill LW1 event, the Men's Giant Slalom LW1 event and the Men's Slalom LW1 event. == References == == External links == * Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Paralympic alpine skiers of the United States Category:American male alpine skiers Category:Alpine skiers at the 1988 Winter Paralympics Category:Medalists at the 1988 Winter Paralympics Category:Paralympic gold medalists for the United States Category:Paralympic medalists in alpine skiing
title: Dan Ashbaugh
